title: Set of 2 Viking Drinking Horn Mug, 100% Authentic Medieval Beer Horn Tankard with Wood Surface, 16 Oz Vikings Horn Cup, Food Grade Ale Mead Polished Tankard, Groomsmen Wedding Gift, Christmas Gift
features: We offer 100% unique horn mugs that stand out in terms of design, shape, and quality.
Item Dimensions: 3*2*6 (LxBxH) Inches. Our Viking mugs have a capacity of 1.2 pounds.
Our mugs are handmade from natural horns and crafted to perfection with a medieval burlap sack.
Our Viking mugs are perfect for gifting to slurp beer, ale, or mead. Gift your partner a unique set of horn mugs that are based on the theme of Game of Thrones.
The handle of the horn mug is also made from the same horn which is hand cut and hand polished from the inside and unpolished from the outside for a real look.
Enjoy your drink like a true Viking in our 100% safe lacquer which are non-toxic and safe.
THIS ITEM IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE BY CHILDREN OF AGE 12 AND UNDER" in the bullet points as suggested by child-safety@amazon.com
